entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
